title: Create New Property Listing
description: An agent needs to create a compelling and accurate MLS listing for a new property.

tasks.description: Retrieve property details, including square footage, number of beds/baths, and tax records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary factual data for the listing.

tasks.description: Write compelling marketing copy for the public remarks section, highlighting key features.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates engaging and descriptive text for the listing.

tasks.description: Upload professional photos and schedule the listing to go live on the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads media and publishes the listing.
